member.name: T:NameCost.WebAPI.UnityConfig
member.summary: Specifies the Unity configuration for the main container.

member.name: M:NameCost.WebAPI.UnityConfig.RegisterTypes(Unity.IUnityContainer)
member.summary: Registers the type mappings with the Unity container.
member.remarks: There is no need to register concrete types such as controllers or API controllers (unless you want to change the defaults), as Unity allows resolving a concrete type even if it was not previously registered.

member.name: T:NameCost.WebAPI.UnityWebApiActivator
member.summary: Provides the bootstrapping for integrating Unity with WebApi when it is hosted in ASP.NET.

member.name: M:NameCost.WebAPI.UnityWebApiActivator.Start
member.summary: Integrates Unity when the application starts.

member.name: M:NameCost.WebAPI.UnityWebApiActivator.Shutdown
member.summary: Disposes the Unity container when the application is shut down.

member.name: T:NameCost.WebAPI.Controllers.ConvertController
member.summary: The main controller of the NameCost web api project

member.name: M:NameCost.WebAPI.Controllers.ConvertController.#ctor(NameCost.Logic.INameCostLogic)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The logic to be used while generating words for the number.

member.name: M:NameCost.WebAPI.Controllers.ConvertController.Convert(NameCost.Core.Models.NameCostModel)
member.summary: Converts the cost number to words.
member.param: The parameter to provide the number to be converted to words.
member.returns: A model containing the generated words for the number
